snippet: The United States makes a formal request for the extradition of Roman Polanski, who fled the country in 1978 before sentencing on a statutory rape charge.
abstract: The United States makes a formal request for the extradition of Roman Polanski, who fled the country in 1978 before sentencing on a statutory rape charge.

headline.main: U.S. Asks Poland to Extradite Polanski
headline.print_headline: U.S. Asks Poland To Extradite Polanski
